item.title: #en @ 1516127310507880454
item.description:
You know what would be cool? A service that notifies you when to put out your trash bins. All driven by open data.
Well, as I live in Germany this will never happen I guess.

item.title: #en @ 1516125732434427905
item.description: @nasmadotali This is why we need more open data.

item.title: #en @ 1516118139980943362
item.description: But it doesn't work well sadly. And you probably prefer the two-step process of entering your postcode then selecting an address. As do I. And it's that step, getting the list of addresses that match a postcode that was privatised and which now can't be open data.

item.title: #fr @ 1515958650648637444
item.description: Une donnée #opendata qui n'existe pas à ma connaissance : Les pharmacies de garde. Quand on habite près d'une pharmacie, il suffit d'aller lire l'info sur la porte. Sinon, on est obligé de faire confiance à des sites bourrés de pub. Cc @Ordre_Pharma @Sante_Gouv

item.description: Does anybody have any resources to suggest on what variables are necessary to remove before posting open data to a repository? Obviously contact information but I've heard others that weren't as common sense to me (e.g., birthdates, disease history, etc) #OpenScience

item.title: #fr @ 1514647579950256129
item.description:
Durant les prochaines semaines, nous vous proposons une plongée au coeur des réutilisations de données ! 🏊 #OpenData

The @sfchronicle data team💫 is hosting our 1st DATATHON📊 4/30!
⭐️ Navigate open data ⭐️ Learn the anatomy of a data story ⭐️ Engage in a fun competition for cool prizes!
Tickets are $15, lunch incl. Msg me if ur a student or can't afford the fee.
https://t.co/Xa1qvJrOUu https://t.co/42JlkFGD7x

item.title: #en @ 1514640493325344772
item.description: If you think #opendata is fair, think again. When it comes to measuring tropical forests, hard-won data made open doesn’t reduce inequalities in science, instead it can increase them. Those who benefit from #opendata are often in privileged situations 💭 https://t.co/1pxue5A9NZ

item.description:
@elonmusk Hey Elon 👋
We are ready to help you build a new social media experience on an open protocol that would help get rid of the existing problems we face with social media today.
It’s time for open data, open-source feed algorithms, free speech, etc.
Ready when you are.

item.title: #fr @ 1514530659263463427
item.description: Et comme d'habitude, ça chouine parce que c'est livré brut (c'est le principe de l'#OpenData) sans interface clicodrome.
